body:
Who would be interested in purchasing an Avicus t-shirt or sweatshirt? Both would likely be available for limited time and be placed at anywhere from $10 to $15 for a t-shirt and $15 to $25 for a hoodie. I need to get an idea of the demand for merchandise before we consider offering it.

Not sure what the design would be which is where I'd like your input as well. Here's a boring one, but still an option had I added text that reads "Avicus Network" or "avicus.net": http://i.imgur.com/pLcYgEY.png
body_tagged:
Who would be interested in purchasing an Avicus t-shirt or sweatshirt? Both would likely be available for limited time and be placed at anywhere from $10 to $15 for a t-shirt and $15 to $25 for a hoodie. I need to get an idea of the demand for merchandise before we consider offering it.

Not sure what the design would be which is where I'd like your input as well. Here's a boring one, but still an option had I added text that reads "Avicus Network" or "avicus.net": http://i.imgur.com/pLcYgEY.png
title: Avicus Merchandise?
